name: Trucky Ball (WIP)
description:
This a  small demo (WIP) for Trucky Ball.

It's a competitive Local Multiplayer car soccer game.  This is just the core game mechanics to test whether it is fun to play and whether it is worth developing further.

The idea is simple, score against the opponent by getting the ball into their goal. You can shoot and crash your way into scoring.

There are 2 modes:

Single Player mode - You can play as the Red truck or the Blue truck. Just choose which Truck you are more comfortable with. The CPU enemy is very basic but challenging enough for testing purposes. 

2 Players mode - Play locally with a friend. There's only keyboard controls for now.

This is a Demo so all sorts of feedback and ideas are welcome :)
